snippet: John Harwood of The Times and CNBC interviewed Senator Rand Paul for the NPR program “On Point,” produced by WBUR-Boston. What follows is a condensed, edited version of their conversation.
abstract: John Harwood of The Times and CNBC interviewed Senator Rand Paul for the NPR program “On Point,” produced by WBUR-Boston. What follows is a condensed, edited version of their conversation.
